description: Episode of Series "BBC Scene". This docudrama looks at what the subsequent history might have been of the boys in the gang that attacked the conductor in the film the "Last Bus" (Title code 006006). Examines the factors which might have caused the boys behaviour, their likely punishment and its effect on them. Companion film to "Last Bus".
